about_us.title: About Us
about_us.text: “HUMER” is a Mexican company, founded in 2013 in the State of Mexico under the individual entrepreneur regime with CURJ920121BE6 registration. Due to the constant evolution of the industry in our country, the company formed an association in 2020, giving rise to what today is SERVICIOS INDUSTRIALES HUMER S.A. de C.V., structured with specialized personnel in welding application, engineering, fabrication, assembly, supervision, and management. Our experience has been forged in metal structures for works, specialized welding, manufacturing metal parts for the industry in general (lime plants, concrete plants, etc.), as well as in the residential sector.
